_description: Properties of raw fats that do not survive saponification. For reference only - not relevant to finished soap.

macadamia-nut-oil.notes: Relevant for leave-on products; less significant for rinse-off soap
macadamia-nut-oil.skinCompatibility: Contains palmitoleic acid similar to human sebum

neem-oil.notes: Traditional medicinal uses; scent persists in soap but therapeutic claims unsubstantiated

tamanu-oil.notes: Traditional medicinal uses for raw oil; not applicable to soap
